item.title: By: DougNic
item.dc:creator: DougNic
item.description: i was a moron once but then things got bad...i was more talking about the flexible product and the flexibility of its application. it is not necessary to expose them to moisture you now.
item.content:encoded: i was a moron once but then things got bad…i was more talking about the flexible product and the flexibility of its application. it is not necessary to expose them to moisture you now.

item.title: By: ECD Fan
item.dc:creator: ECD Fan
item.description: You must think the consumers are morons. Why would anyone pay $20 per Watt for foldable chargers that fall apart under moisture (as they are based on CIGS), when poly- and monocrystalline foldable chargers are easily available for $10 per Watt or less?
item.content:encoded: You must think the consumers are morons. Why would anyone pay $20 per Watt for foldable chargers that fall apart under moisture (as they are based on CIGS), when poly- and monocrystalline foldable chargers are easily available for $10 per Watt or less?
